So, I'm enjoying running devnet-2.

I'm managing to be able to get transactions included via MetaMask when only running the EL, without running the CL. I understand that this is because the EL "optimistically syncs forward (without setting head)" and that "in the future [I] would need a CL client".

Which brings me to the question: is there a risk that some people who currently run e.g. geth, for their application, may believe that they are "merge-ready", when in fact they aren't? How can we make it easy for people to validate their "merge-readiness"?
